name: R Session for IND E 321 Spring 2016
tagline: See you on Friday in the Spring 2016
body:
### Welcome to INDE 321 TA session
TA session will mainly focus on discussing R and homework problems. Here you can find all the materials (slides and codes) used for IND E 321 TA session in spring 2015 at Industrial Engineering department at University of Washington.

The goal of this session is to introduce the fundamental operations of R, and further to help you do statistical quality control analysis with R.

For the latest slides and developments on bootcamp materials, check out [My GitHub](https://github.com/ninginthecloud/INDE321_TA)

### Session module
Each module of the R session is independent and will be hold in scheduled Friday morning from 1:00pm to 2:20pm, in this spring quarter. Hence please bring your laptop with R and RStudio preinstalled before Friday's lecture.

#### 2016-04-08: Introduction to R

Help you set up R and RStudio environment, introduce the basic operations and basic plotting in R.
*Coming soon*


### Support or Contact
Having trouble with this content? Contact [Yan Jin](ningli30@uw.edu) or [Dr. Shuai Huang](shuaih@uw.edu), and weâ€™ll help you sort it out.
